Science
As the planet gets warmer it evaporates more water leading to more rainfall in most of the world some places may stay drier but it is having an effect on the planet that's for sure.
Major storms and droughts are less likely to happen, Africa is getting greener, Canada and Russia north are becoming more hospitality for crops, we have a more efficient and effective shipping lane ie the northwest passage.
Tldr: when the planet is warmer is more tropical making life better for all.
Side note Science had a consensus that the world was flat till one scientist with a different opinion prove that it wasn't same thing happened with every major scientist throughout history.
